channel.title: CVE Feed for OTRS AG -- OTRSTicketForms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OTRS AG -- OTRSTicketForms

item.title: CVE-2020-1779|2024-09-16T17:15:28.699Z -- otrs%20ag -- otrsticketforms
item.description: When dynamic templates are used (OTRSTicketForms), admin can use OTRS tags which are not masked properly and can reveal sensitive information. This issue affects: OTRS AG OTRSTicketForms 6.0.x version 6.0.40 and prior versions; 7.0.x version 7.0.29 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.3 and prior versions.
